parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array of controls on the row with the given index.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Array]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[Control]] '''ctRowControls''' [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_array = _control [[ctRowControls]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctAddRow]], [[ctAddHeader]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctSetCurSel]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctSetData]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindRowHeader]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveRows]], [[ctRemoveHeaders]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]]
